description:
Miriel returns in an exciting sequel. Find out what's the story behind the mysterious egg artifact and journey through four unique locations. Create bread, potions, cakes, colored cloth, and many of other of exciting products. Use powerful spells to aid your tasks and buy more products and skills from the shop. Miriel's Enchanted Mystery HD is ripe with entertaining choices! 

"Overall, I highly recommend Miriel's Enchanted Mystery (MEM) for fans and non-fans of the time management games." -wirebot (9.5/10) 

"If you're a fan of time management, you'll likely enjoy Miriel's Enchanted Mystery. It's not a revolutionary title, but it's a high-quality one that will satisfy fans and is light-hearted enough that kids can enjoy it, too." -jayisgames.com 

"Ultra Recommended" -casualexplosion.com 

Also available for iPhone! Just search for Miriel's Enchanted Mystery 

Also check out the first Miriel-game: Miriel the Magical Merchant for TouchPad.
